name: ​ActionLinkTemplate​BindingInput

fields.name: key
fields.description: The name of the binding variable key specified in the action link template in Setup. For example, if the binding variable in the template is {!Binding.firstName},  the key is firstName

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the binding variable key. For example, if the key is firstName, this value could be Joan.

description: A key-value pair to fill in a binding variable value from an action link template.
